content: OG$_REMARK.TLC`, `XCREW.MLOG$_REMARK.TYPE` and `XCREW.MLOG$_REMARK.DATE_` fields. * Insert and update operations are carried out using Unique Key. * No delete operation is performed; instead, `status`(see Mapping for details) is updated based on the retrieved data. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |crewId|`XCREW.MLOG$_REMARK`|`TLC`| | |notice|`XCREW.MLOG$_REMARK`|`REMARK`| | |type|`XCREW.MLOG$_REMARK`|`TYPE`| | |date|`XCREW.MLOG$_REMARK`|`DATE_`| | |status|`XCREW.MLOG$_REMARK`|`DMLTYPE$$`|when `XCREW.MLOG$_REMARK.DMLTYPE$$` = “D“ then “CANCELLED“ else “ACTIVE“| # Crew Notification Alerts Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope **Tracking Released Notification:** * Retrieve records where `XCREW.MLOG$_NOTIFICATION.SEQUENCE$$` > Sequence of the Latest Retrieved Data and status(see Mapping for details) is not null. **Tracking Preparing Notification:** * Preparing Notification MLOG Insert&Delete Records: * Retrieve records where `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.SEQUENCE$$` > Sequence of the Latest Retrieved Data and `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.DMLTYPE$$` <> “U” and `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.TYPE` = “1“ and `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.BEGIN_DATE` >= “01.01.2024“. * Preparing Notification MLOG Update Records: * Retrieve records where `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.SEQUENCE$$` > Sequence of the Latest Retrieved Data and `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.DMLTYPE$$` = “U” and `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.OLD_NEW$$` = “N” and `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.TYPE` = “1“ and `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.BEGIN_DATE` >= “01.01.2024“. * Group these records by `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.TLC`, `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.BEGIN_DATE`, `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.BEGIN_TIME`, `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.TYPE`, `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.HOSTNAME`, `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.PID`. * Retrieve Max(`XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.SEQUENCE$$`) within each group. #### - Source Query **Tracking Released Notification:** `
